Title: Establishes a payment verification program for certified businesses on subcontracts
Summary: Establishes a payment verification program for the purposes of ensuring that certified businesses on subcontracts, are able to confirm that such certified business has received prompt payment from a contractor within fifteen days of a contractors submission of an invoice to the state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to instituting a payment verification program for certified businesses on subcontracts
